title: My Client Keeps Crashing
body:
I'm just going to explain the issue and not my frustration with it. so right when we finish champion select it as it tries to go to the loading screen the logo comes up as usual the i'm greeted to a black screen and the spinning circle of my pointer after a minute the message "you have been disconnected please check your internet connection" or something along the lines of that i'm not going to try to get that message again. with this i hit retry because i know my internet connection is working. sometimes it actually reconnects but for some reason for a second i have a ping of 999 but after a second it normalises to 42-ish and i don't have ping troubles for the rest of the game but there have been at least five times where i cannot connect and i"m given leaver buster  

please help me with this situation because i like your game and leaver buster is a pain in the ass especially when you know that it wasn't your fault

replies.body:
I suspect there may be a local network configuration that's not playing so well with League. I recommend ensuring your local settings are up to par by checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). This may not immediately resolve the issue, but it will get us on the right track to doing so.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
